SmartBox Drupal Corporate Theme Documentation

Corporate Responsive Drupal Corporate Theme

  • Last Updated: Apr 27, 2015
  • Themed By: DesignsSquare.com
  • Email: contact@designssquare.com
.

Thank you for purchasing our theme. If you have any questions, please feel free to email us!

see also designer documentation here

About

Intro

The Drupal Corporate Theme - SmartBox is the elegant and stylish design of SmartBox powered by Drupal for your personal or business needs. We have added enhanced CKEditor editor for seamless editing to easy customize. Besides over 8 layouts, 25 sample pages and 10 blocks, each background of the page and header are customizable to give flexibility convert Drupal Corporate Theme - SmartBox uniquely to your desires and wishes

Highlights

The unique and the most noted aspects of the Drupal Corporate Theme - SmartBox

  • Runs on Twitter Bootstrap to easy extend beyond whats provided
  • Over 8 different layouts(types) and 25 sample pages
  • Over 10 additional blocks for complete customization
  • Customizable background image of each page
  • Customizable header background image for most of the content types/pages
  • Supports enhanced CKEditor integration for seamless editing and 20 most popular free plugins
  • Easy & quick installation/configuration via Drush/Workflow

Included

  • Sample Date for kickstart
  • SmartBox Design v.1.1
  • Twitter Bootstrap 2.3.2
  • jQuery 1.9.1
  • Enhanced CKEditor integration and 20 most popular free CKEditor plugins (DesignsSquare CKEditor Widget, )
  • Support to deploy from sub directory of Web Server root directory (DesignsSquare.com VIRTUAL_HOSTY)

Installation

How To Install?

In the following are the steps to install SmartBox Drupal Corporate Theme

  1. Copy all modules into sites/all/modules folder
  2. Copy all themes into sites/all/themes folder
  3. Enable theme 'bootstrap' and set theme 'smartbox' as default
  4. Enable DesignsSquare.com Library, DesignsSquare.com Library: Sample Data, DesignsSquare.com TEMPLATE_API widget, DesignsSquare.com Theme Blocks, DesignsSquare.com SMARTBOX_THEME widget
  5. Enable module - "DesignsSquare.com: Theme: SmartBox: Configurations & Structure Data"
  6. Enable module Designssquare.com: Theme: SmartBox: Sample Data if you wish sample data(recommended).
  7. To enable Enhanced CKEditor support for seamless editing, enable "DesignsSquare CKEditor Widget" and "DesignsSquare.com: Utils: CKEditor"
  8. Revert any features in OVERRIDE state and clear all cache

-- OR --

Only One command with Drush tool - Workflow as following:

drush pa new-install @ALIAS --package=path/to/package.tar.gz --env=test --tag=kickstart,editor,tune_up

This command will do it all. It will spin new Drupal instance, install and configure SmartBox theme. It will also import sample data, install and configure ckeditor theme integration for seamless editing, and tune with some popular modules such as Corporate_menu, module_fileter,etc. If you don't like to have any of the extra - sample data import, CKeditor integration or tune up, then just run without that tag name "--tag". For more details, see workflow documentation section "Profile It ALL" here

Types

In the following are custom types supported in SmartBox Drupal Corporate Theme

Supported Content Types

The SmartBox Corporate theme supports following content types:

  • Home(home) - home layout with promo area at the top for slider(home.tpl.php)
  • Basic(page) - the basic page with no columns and "Node Bottom" region at the bottom for slider and other blocks(page.tpl.php). It also has field to upload background image of the header
  • Basic - Simple Header(basic_simple) - the same as Basic Page except header is the simple version without image(page--basic-simple.tpl.php)
  • Basic - No Header(basic_no_header) - the same as Basic Page except there is no any header section (page--basic-header.tpl.php)
  • Basic - Right Sidebar(basic_right_sidebar) - the same as Basic Page except there is right sidebar - "Secondary" region to assign blocks (page--right-sidebar.tpl.php)
  • Basic - Left Sidebar(basic_left_sidebar) - the same as Basic Page except there is left sidebar - "Primary" region to assign blocks (page--left-sidebar.tpl.php)
  • 404(page_404) - the layout for 404 page with extra field to upload background image of the header (page--404.tpl.php)
  • Contact(page_contact) - the layout for contact page with embedded contact form, map and sidebar region with assigned "Contact Info" block by default (page--contact.tpl.php)

About Blocks

In the following is list of blocks included in the SmartBox Drupal Corporate Theme:

  • Main Menu block

    The block of main menu assigned in the Top Bar region by default

  • Search Form

    Drupal Search block assigned to the one of the sidebar regions

  • DesignsSquare Theme: Block: Flex Slider Full

    Slider for displaying Clients assigned to the "Node Bottom" region by default

  • DesignsSquare Theme: Block: Copyrights

    This block is assigned to Footer region by default. In the BASIC package, the block is editable via template at themes/smartbox/templates/designssquare-com-theme-blocks/basic/block--ds-copy-rights.tpl.php. In the PLUS package, the block is editable from the UI

  • DesignsSquare Theme: Block: Contact Info

    This block is assigned to Right Column region in Contact page by default. In the BASIC package, the block is editable via template at themes/smartbox/templates/designssquare-com-theme-blocks/basic/block--ds-contact-info.tpl.php. In the PLUS package, the block is editable from the UI

  • DesignsSquare: Template API: Contact Form

    This Contact Form block is rendered in Contact page by default. In the BASIC package, the block is editable via template at themes/smartbox/templates/template-api/contact.tpl.php.

  • DesignsSquare: Template API: Contact Teaser Form

    The Contact Teaser Form/Block is assigned to "Node Bottom" region in Contact page by default. In the BASIC package, the block is editable via template at themes/smartbox/templates/template-api/contact-teaser.tpl.php.

  • DesignsSquare Theme: Block: Social

    This block is assigned to footer by default. In the BASIC package, the block is editable via template at themes/smartbox/templates/designssquare-com-theme-blocks/basic/block--ds-social.tpl.php. In the PLUS package, the block is editable from the UI

  • DesignsSquare Theme: Block: Blog Categories

    This block displays Blog Categories. In the BASIC package, the block is editable via template at themes/smartbox/templates/designssquare-com-theme-blocks/basic/block--ds-blog-categories.tpl.php. In the PLUS package, the block is editable from the UI part of DesignsSquare Blog Widget

  • DesignsSquare Theme: Block: Blog Tags

    This block displays Blog Tags. In the BASIC package, the block is editable via template at themes/smartbox/templates/designssquare-com-theme-blocks/basic/block--ds-blog-tags.tpl.php. In the PLUS package, the block is editable from the UI part of DesignsSquare Blog Widget

  • DesignsSquare Theme: Block: Blog Archive

    This block displays Blog Archive. In the BASIC package, the block is editable via template at themes/smartbox/templates/designssquare-com-theme-blocks/basic/block--ds-blog-archive.tpl.php. In the PLUS package, the block is editable from the UI part of DesignsSquare Blog Widget

  • DesignsSquare Theme: Block: Recent Posts - Sidebar

    This block displays Blog resent posts assigned to sidebar. In the BASIC package, the block is editable via template at themes/smartbox/templates/designssquare-com-theme-blocks/basic/block--ds-recent-posts-sidebar.tpl.php. In the PLUS package, the block is editable from the UI part of DesignsSquare Blog Widget

  • DesignsSquare Theme: Block: Recent Posts

    This block displays Blog resent posts assigned to node area central part of page. In the BASIC package, the block is editable via template at themes/smartbox/templates/designssquare-com-theme-blocks/basic/block--ds-recent-posts-sidebar.tpl.php. In the PLUS package, the block is editable from the UI part of DesignsSquare Blog Widget

  • DesignsSquare Theme: Block: Recent Tweets

    This block displays latest tweets. In the BASIC package, the block is editable via template at themes/smartbox/templates/designssquare-com-theme-blocks/basic/block--ds-recent-tweets.tpl.php. In the PLUS package, the block is editable from the UI part of DesignsSquare Social Widget

Context

Smartbox Drupal Corporate Theme utilizes context module to manage blocks. In the following is a list of contexts preconfigured in Drupal Corporate Theme Smartbox

  • smartbox_statewide

    This is the state wide context activates on all pages except those contexts excluding state wide context

  • smartbox_right_sidebar

    This context activates for sample page "Right Sidebar" with path "/right-sidebar"

  • smartbox_left_sidebar

    This context activates for sample page "Left Sidebar" with path "/left-sidebar"

  • smartbox_contact

    This context activates for pages of type Contact.

  • smartbox_blog

    This context manages blocks in sidebars for Blog sample pages

Fields

In the following are additional custom fields used in SmartBox Drupal Corporate Theme

  • Summary of Body field

    The summary field of the body field is used for header text displayed at the top of each page in the promo area

  • Header Background(field_header_background)

    Image field of Basic page to display header background for easy customization. The recommended size is 1250x300px

  • Page Background(field_page_background)

    Image field of Basic page to display in Page background for easy customization. The recommended size is 2000x1200px

About Regions

In the following is list of regions supported in SmartBox Drupal Corporate Theme:

  • Footer(footer)
    The region on bottom of the page. By default, the block - Copyrights, Social is assigned to this region
  • Top Bar(header)
    The region on top of the page. By default, the block - Main Menu is assigned to this region
  • Node Bottom(node_bottom)
    The region at the bottom of each page within node scope. It is used for assign different blocks such as "Clients We Love" slider, Related Posts block,etc
  • Right & Left Sidebar(Primary and Secondary)
    The regions of sidebar on each side left and right

Dependent Modules

In the following are the main Drupal module dependencies

  • context : to manage blocks such as search block,etc
  • pathauto: for page path naming
  • features: for import/export Database settings/configurations as well ass sample data for kickstart

For complete list, see the .make file provided in the package
